definition: the northern part of the country/the North

sentences.english: Do you want to let me wonder how to hate you? In such a snowy night in the norland, I will remain awake again.
sentences.chinese: 在北國這一個下雪的晚上，又將無眠。

sentences.english: Heavy rain and lightning, resulting in Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport flight delays.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨和閃電，致使重慶江北國際機場航班出現延誤。

sentences.english: She lives in an icy northern city.
The northland corpse heap, such as , the dust spreads Sui Tang in a twinkling, the empire firework time world.
sentences.chinese: 北國屍體堆如麻，塵土瞬間灑隋唐，帝國煙火遍天下。

sentences.english: A thousand leagues of whirling snow.
sentences.chinese: 北國風光，千里冰封，萬里雪飄。

sentences.english: Spring, like a stout rod small group, he pushes open the thousands of miles of the northern ice.
sentences.chinese: 春天像一個粗壯的棒小夥，他撞開了北國的千里冰封。

sentences.english: Soon the northern lands will be locked in the cold of the polar night.
sentences.chinese: 很快北國疆土就會被極夜的寒冷所吞沒。

sentences.english: The North was still cold chilly, but everywhere in the Southland already provided a green view.
sentences.chinese: 北國還在春寒料峭，南國已然綠色滿園。

sentences.english: Locust trees in the North, as a decorative embellishment of nature, also associate us with autumn.
sentences.chinese: 北國的槐樹，也是一種能使人聯想起來的點綴。

sentences.english: Northland scenery, ice thousands of miles, miles.
sentences.chinese: 北國風光，千里冰封，萬里雪飄。

sentences.english: Not every autumn in the north, has been nearly ten years.
sentences.chinese: 不逢北國之秋，已將近十餘年了。

sentences.english: She lives in Harbin—known as a “city of ice” in Northeast China.
She lives in the ice city.
She lives in ice city of North.
The sword points northward with heroism burning.
Marriage atmosphere surrounded by these men from the North.
sentences.chinese: 婚戀氣息包圍着這些來自北國的男人。

definition: Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)
Mancheng county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
